name: Introduction to Economics
description: This course provides an introduction to the field of economics and its core principles.

name: Macroeconomics
description: This course is a study of the behavior of the national, regional, and global economies.

name: Microeconomics
description: This course covers the principles of microeconomics, including supply and demand, cost and production, and market structure.

name: Econometrics
description: This course covers the use of statistical methods and data in economics, including regression analysis, hypothesis testing, and forecasting.

name: Health Economics
description: This course covers the economics of health and health care, including financing, insurance, and demand and supply.
